title: Genealogies of Other Tribes
summary: The chapter lists genealogies of Issachar, Benjamin, Naphtali, Manasseh, Ephraim, and Asher. It highlights military strength and growth among these tribes, emphasizing their role in Israel’s heritage.

faq.question: What’s emphasized about these tribes?
faq.answer: Their descendants were numerous and formed skilled armies.

faq.question: Which tribes are mentioned?
faq.answer: Issachar, Benjamin, Naphtali, Manasseh, Ephraim, and Asher.
